ing: 1 (28 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
des: "My hometown has a pumpkin festival every year and this is one of the recipes our family enjoys."
ins: In a large pot over medium heat, cook beef until brown; drain.  Stir in onion and bell pepper and cook 5 minutes.  Stir in beans, tomato juice, diced tomatoes and pumpkin puree.  Season with pumpkin pie spice, chili powder and sugar.  Simmer 1 hour.
